website_summaries.verdict: Made by a company in the USA, this purse comes with a 60-day warranty against manufacturing defects.
pros: Sturdy bag made of durable lead-free and BPA-free materials
This bag has an attractive appearance with black microfiber trim and silver hardware
Includes two inside pockets and a front pocket with a Velcro closure
The top zips securely and the straps are a comfortable shoulder length
cons: The “phone pocket” is too small to fit most smartphones
Black flap over the front pocket may not pass muster at stadiums with “clear bag only” policies

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super cute. I work as a pharmacy tech and the only purses we’re allowed to have are clear. This is an upgrade for me from a ziplock bag... :) I get compliments daily when I’m out with this from people asking where I got it. I’ve worn it every day for almost 5 months and so far I haven’t had any quality issues with it. I’ll admit, I waited to write my review because I was expecting it to fall apart after a month with it being so affordable, but I’m definitely impressed and will be purchasing different styles.
customer_reviews.author: eggduelkicks

customer_reviews.title: Most stylish transparent purse ever!
customer_reviews.text: We are in a sports city and often attend sporting events where you aren't allowed to bring in a purse unless it is transparent. This purse was a suitable replacement for my actual purse bc it's stylish looking with the chrome squares and the extra flap on the side at least feels like you aren't totally open to the world (as if you would ever want the world to see the inside of your purse.) The plastic is thick and feels like it will hold up. The fact it has nice handles also makes it a winner. I would recommend this purse for any woman who is stylish but attends large sporting events with high security.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: No returns!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, NO RETURNS. This bag came with a long brown scuff on the back that I can’t get off, and the front pocket is stitched on crooked. It is all around smaller than expected, and the side pocket is too small to use. I like that it looks more like a handbag than all the other clear bags I’ve seen, but I’m disappointed otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife who needed this for her work at her retail site where you need a clear bag or leave the purse in the car. At first she scoffed at it but she consistantly used it for 4 months there's no wear and tear. I saw her carrying couple books in there too. It looks better than some bags I've seen on Amazon which just looks cheap. She no longer uses it since she doesn't work retail but for those 4 months of daily usage it held up well. Material seems to be thick heavy duty plastic so it looks pretty durable. Stitching seems very durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: BigBoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the workplace
customer_reviews.text: I work at the airport and are required to carry clear bags. This has been by far the most durable clear bag that I have purchased. The side pockets are perfect for small items such as chap stick and pens. The small side pocket fits my Mophie charger perfectly. The straps are comfortable even when the bag is heavy. Hoping it is made as a cross body bag too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pagliuca

customer_reviews.title: Looks like an actual purse
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd clear purse I ordered since the first one didn’t look like an actual purse but more like a clear lunch box. Ladies will know what I mean. This one actually looks like a real purse so I was pleased with it. The trim is good and not cheap looking. Plastic part is very stiff which is why I didn’t give it 5 stars. It does the trick for working moms leaving work and going straight to our kid’s games without having to change purses.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma  "C"

customer_reviews.title: Great for Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for work where I can only bring a clear bag to my desk due to security policy. Holds just the right amount. I like that it has a front pocket and side pocket. Seems to be well made. I bought my daughter one too. She commented that even if she didn't need it for work, she would like it for the fact that she can locate things easy.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag because it has 2 side pockets for phone etc. It is large enough for my water bottle and I don't have to worry about my phone getting wet. Use it for basketball games at our local university.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great work bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I have to use a clear bag for work and this is the best one I have come across. I liked so much when mine wore out I ordered the exact same one again. I have also had several people at work ask me about my bag and end up getting the same one. They all like them as much as I do. Stylish and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Powell

customer_reviews.title: 1st one better.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag a few years ago, loved it. So this time it just feels cheaper. The corner protectors are ready to fall off, after 2 days of use. There are some strings hanging out in the sewing too. I really liked the 1st one I ordered, this one not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lecash

customer_reviews.title: however it is exactly what I needed and it fits perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: At first I was reluctant to pay so much for a bag, however it is exactly what I needed and it fits perfect for my needs. It is well made and very classy looking. I am very pleased with it. The first bag I ordered had a sewing defect requiring me to order another one. Amazon credited me for the first and overnight delivered the second one that arrived in perfect condition. This was only a minor issue and Amazon quickly replaced it with no trouble. Still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: livn4him

customer_reviews.title: Good value for work lunch and carryall
customer_reviews.text: Good style, great handles, a little on the small side if you carry an ice pack with lunch and drink. I like the front separate pouch for keys and phone. Side pocket is small but sufficient for small items like lipstick. I changed from a much larger clear bag to this since the older bag was too big to put in fridge and the plastic was cracking. Overall I like this bag because it's a good value with nice compact purse look.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine state

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a Trainer's Bag to go
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our training equipment, for an easy Trainer's Bag to go. We use a Check-In/Check-out Process to cut down on our high end equipment. This was the perfect size to hold a projector, webcam, presentor/clicker, extender VGA cable and extension cord
customer_reviews.author: Maria V

customer_reviews.title: Will not last, dont buy this trash
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks of use it has already blown out seems on the end of the bag it would be great bag as long as you did not have to put anything in it ...and few days after that rrrriiiipppppp ! now both sides are open and bag is not a sheet of plastic with some handles dont buy this piece of trash
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Not accepted into Gillette Field!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag but was not allowed inside Gillette Field! They told me the black flap made it ‘not clear”.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoka

customer_reviews.title: Great item for those needing to contend with security on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.text: Great item for those needing to contend with security on a regular basis. My Wife works at sports arenas on behalf of charitable organizations; they often require all bags to be see-through; this bag has proven reliable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Wagener

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t keen on buying a clear bag. However, this one is actually very cute!!!!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is okay except for two things: one is lack of exterior or additional pockets. It is basically one large rectangular plastic box with two mesh pouches that a standard water bottle does not fit into well and one zippered side pocket. It needs more additional pockets like a regular briefcase for files, pens, etc. The other problem is the flimsiness of the plastic; this bag has no structural support like a regular briefcase and collapses on itself due to lack of sturdiness. If you think this is a regular briefcase, just see-through, think again...will not re-purchase a replacement if this gets damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dai Bando

customer_reviews.title: Bummed hairstylist/makeup artist.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered thos twice thinking the first time was just a bad experience. Both times unfortunately, packaging was wripped and dirty, the actual bag was dirty and broken handles. Bummer wanted this bag to work because ive ordered other sizes and enjoy using clear bags to get to my products faster. Im a freelance hairstylist and makeuo artist, bags like this save us time. Wishes for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie K

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily
customer_reviews.text: Working in corrections can be a tough environment but honestly the day to day is pretty routine and the bag is already tearing and I can no longer use it because of the seems tearing apart. I am very disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Cofer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife works in retail and therefore has to use a clear bag to carry her wallet and other items going to and from work. After more than six months of almost daily use, it still looks great all the zippers, snaps, etc. work the same as when it was new. If you need this type of bag this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.N.

customer_reviews.title: "Beautiful clear handbag has some setbacks"
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the opportunity to rate this bag. I used it for the opening game day of my favorite team. It is very stylish and fashionable and it stands from all of the other bags I've seen. However, while using it I found that the four(4) brass tips loca5ted on each side of the bag are very sharp and can be prone to scratching or even cutting the skin if touched too hastily. I've gotten scratched by these brass tips. What would you suggest that would make the bag more comfortable for use? That is the reason I could not give the bag 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jabber Juice

customer_reviews.title: Cute design.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use in a pharmacy I had was interning at and was promptly shouted at and instructed to never show up there with a purse again. Needless to say, it's pretty cute especially for the summer. My only complaint is that the clear plastic is very rigid, making it kind of tough to dig around in.
customer_reviews.author: inlinesix

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CLEAR TOTE
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear tote.Front big pocket great for my six inch cell phone etc.The little side cell phone pocket small enough to fit cellphone in but I use it for lip balm lip stick or any thing small (keys) etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Great clear briefcase / tote
customer_reviews.text: Have to occasionally use something like this to satisfy Loss Prevention rules yet still be able to bring all I need to do my job. So for that, I am grateful to have found this. However, would have loved more inside compartments to keep every little thing from just falling to wherever it wants. Seems well made and I have to carry a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Light use only
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to be able to carry much weight in this bag. The side seam ripped out on me in the first two weeks. It is quite a large bag. Shame to be so flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: blt152561

customer_reviews.title: Clear handbag with front pocket
customer_reviews.text: I love this handbag since I have to use a clear bag for work. Perfect size. I love to use it as a shoulder bag which I have't seen anywhere. Everyone I work with love and and want to buy one. dmel1019@hotmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: The bag was fine at first until it decided to rip all the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag was fine at first until it decided to rip all the way down where the zipper inseam is. Now, I have a bag that's completely open all the time. I am now trying to find a new bag only 2 months after owning this one. I would not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon!

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag! Perfect for Retail!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great sturdy bag with excellent handles for over the shoulder.. I bought it for my daughter who works in retail and she loves it. The pockets are well appointed and I think this will hold up for a long time. It's a substantial bag and feels great on the body. Not some cheap vinyl. Arrived super fast too! The hardware gives it some extra styling too! Love...
customer_reviews.author: Bimmy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag in many ways
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice bag if you like transparency. It is self light weight and long length drop handle in which are important for me other than the sleek looking. The fair price and nice size of the bag made the perfect purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoli shen

customer_reviews.title: Best For The Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it . With work its a policy to have clear pocket ( handbags ) .She Loves the side pocket for phone . Just the right size to fit in a locker . If they had purple and other colors would be great . Fast delivery also .
customer_reviews.author: RonnieLeo

customer_reviews.title: Quality versus Price Point
customer_reviews.text: Product is of decent quality yet not worth the price. Purchased for use at sports events to meet new security requirements and will keep. In retrospect, should have waited until more vendors provided merchandise meeting standards at a more realistic price point for like product
customer_reviews.author: SEASLU

customer_reviews.title: Great handbag for work!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag and hope the manufacturer continues to sell it. It can hold so much , I use it for my iPad, iPhone iPod, the cords, makeup,lunch all at the same time. I take it in my car with me everywhere. Very durable. Great great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carol haidze

customer_reviews.title: must have for casino employees!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new purse! It is stylish enough to carry outside of work, yet serves the purpose I purchased it for. Be careful with the corners though, they are really sharp! I don't know if it is the stitching or the actual material but be aware of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Ginder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a warehouse that enforces clear bags and this one is perfect! It's well-made and has held up so far (I've had it almost a year) and I get a ton of complements and inquiries as to where I got my bag. The extra pockets are perfect for people who love to keep items organized. I highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaB

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it... 😣
customer_reviews.text: This bag was attractive, the size was good, the black pouch shown in front, had been badly folded in transit, and the Velcro did not close this compartment. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful condition. Regular size. side pockets cant fit my iphone but it's cool. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great casino purse
customer_reviews.text: Needed a clear hand bag for my job working in a casino. Pretty durable and spacious. Lost a metal corner bracket piece on one of the corners after about a month of using it. It looks funny to me, but it is sown together well, so it's just a minor cosmetic thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon (Owens) Viveiros

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this purse
customer_reviews.text: I am really feeling this purse. It's a little bigger then I thought it would be , which isn't a problem at all. Overall I'm happy that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: My first bag was defective so I returned it for ...
customer_reviews.text: My first bag was defective so I returned it for replacement and the new bag is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This bag is roomy, has nice pockets, and the straps are the perfect length. If I have to carry a clear bag for work, this is the best one available.
customer_reviews.author: Fionna Schwab

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: EVERYONE ASKS WHERE DID I GET THIS PURSE....AND I TELL THEM PROUDLY. LOTS OF ROOM AND HOLDS ALOT OF STUFF. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: MARIA KAHLER

customer_reviews.title: made very sturdy, large enough to carry personal things to work ...
customer_reviews.text: have only been carrying it about a week, made very sturdy, large enough to carry personal things to work and my kindle. also looks nice

customer_reviews.title: Great purse for us retail peeps
customer_reviews.text: this is the best purse if you work in a retail job that requires clear handbags. Plenty of room for all your stuff and it looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Muggle 68

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Style
customer_reviews.text: working in a retail store that requires us to carry clear handbags, this one has style and quality....so much better than carrying the poor quality clear make up pouches! Nice to have phone pocket and front pocket!
customer_reviews.author: M. Shackleton

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Very sturdy and love the pocket in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Very sturdy and love the pocket in the front and on the side for the phone. Use it because we have to bring a clear bag for work this one fits the bill. Handle is also a good length.

customer_reviews.title: great material I wish I will be able to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: great material I wish I will be able to buy another one but I could not find one the same.

customer_reviews.text: I work in retail and I am required to use a clear bag. This bag is reasonably priced and is a great size

customer_reviews.text: I'm Really Happy With It. Just What Was Looking For. Thank U

customer_reviews.text: Everyone at work thinks it looks more like a purse.... manufactured great though. No issues other an work place bullying

customer_reviews.title: ... wife works at a prison and this was a great size for her to take all her
customer_reviews.text: my wife works at a prison and this was a great size for her to take all her stuff

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for me. K
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking, poor quality.. Not a good choice for me.. Used it three days it looks ugly, I will put in the Goodwill bag.
customer_reviews.author: Coral D. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Have to use for work, only clear bags in warehouse, carries alot! Papers, lotion, small stamper, calculator, small notebook, small pouch (personal girl monthly stuff), work gloves, safety knife, pens, water bottle and even gatorade bottle! Sorry for the boring list but goes to show you can fit alot of stuff and this is the normal every day list of things for me. I have had this bag for almost a yr and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Functional Work Bag
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of complements on the bag in the correctional facility in which I work. Many of the staff want to know where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work.
customer_reviews.text: I work in an environment where cloth materials are not allowed. This bag is perfect for me to carry my laptop and necessary accessories.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased !
customer_reviews.text: Priced right and arrived in time for when I needed it for Preakness. A very happy customer. I would recommend to anyone who heeds a clear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ones out there
customer_reviews.text: One of the best ones out there. I work in a casino and we have to use clear bags. My first one in green lasted 2 year my last one a little over a year. You do need to use gorilla glue or heavy duty glue on the straps but overall works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Behrns

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Clear bag
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but I like the style. Quality is very good. I would not hesitate buying this bag if you need a clear bag for work. games. etc
customer_reviews.author: Lynn K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Ooops wrong review previously  this is the superior bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two bags and this is the superior bag. Great style and made much better than the other bag.
customer_reviews.author: triple trouble

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It's spacious and has pockets, which I appreciate. The quality of the bag is also quite decent. A good buy for a clear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Horne

customer_reviews.title: clear bag
customer_reviews.text: its not strong it cant hold any real weight meaning don't put anything heavy in it the straps will pop. its for show can only hold light objects. i'm not saying its bad but I needed something more durable the plastic can bend and create a whole sounds confusing its something you'd have to see to understand. its not for me but might be great for someone else

customer_reviews.title: I actually like this one enough to use every day

I had several co-workers say I paid to much for the purse and I too, thought it was a bit pricy for plastic. I have only used it for a short time but compared to what I was using there is no comparison.

customer_reviews.title: I needed a bag like this so my wife could bring it into football games.

customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for work, where I have to carry a clear bag. I am very happy with this bag.

Love the two pockets (large one in front and small one on side) and it zips shut so nothing will fall out. Can't recommend this enough. I have no problem getting through the entrance to the stadium.

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, but it was missing one of the silver accent pieces on the front. I needed to use it the next day,so I had to do with out.I was very disappointed that it was shipped that way.

customer_reviews.title: great for retail
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister because she works retail and she needs to put some of the machines she works with in the bag also. she loves it. people have asked her where she got it. excellent buy. made well.

customer_reviews.title: Clear Bag For The Future
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag like this when I recently traveled to Boston for the marathon. The security peopled LOVED the fact that they could look into the bad without opening it up and looking through everything. I also took it to Dodger Stadium and, again, the security people liked the fact that it was clear and that you could see through it.

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: After one week, a metal corner fell off, and after two weeks the cell phone pocket has separated halfway from the bag.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag! The three outside pockets are great and it fits all my see through bag requirements for work.

customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use it when I work at Nationals Park. It makes it easier for me to get checked in and out through the security check point.

customer_reviews.title: nice bag, good size
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived with small black marks on it. It's not very noticeable so I keep it. Overall, nice bag, good size.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana Decicco

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice size, I love the extra pockets
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size , I love the extra pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a casino associate and need a clear bag for work. I never have any luck finding a clear handbag at an actual store, they are either too big, too small, or just poor quality. I was so excited to find this one! It arrived on time and was exactly as described online. I get compliments everyday on my new bag. My only issue so far, the little metal trim pieces at the top are falling off already. It not a huge deal, I just hope its not an indication of the bag's overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Great see through purse
customer_reviews.text: My main use for this is when I go out to football games with my dad. More easier to go through security.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: The purse is what I needed. I'm glad I found it here. I would recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size for taking into a football stadium, since they are now requiring clear bags that are 12" X 12".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Found the weak link in 2 weeks. Where the strap attaches the plastic is single sewed. Viola
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wooley Jr

product_meta.title: CHM Women's Designer Inspired Transparent Clear Purse Handbags with Handles
product_meta.description:
Fashion forward, practical, and compliant with many workplace clear bag policies, CHM’s line of designer-inspired briefcases, purses, and tote bags offer great value at an affordable price. These bags are easy to clean and sturdy enough to stand up to regular use as clear lunch bags, transparent purses, accessory bags, toiletry carriers, and more. Their extra-thick vinyl and reinforced seams keep them from collapsing in on themselves, and the heavyweight metal hardware on each bag far outperforms the silver-painted plastic found on similar models from other manufacturers.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :12 x 5 x 11 inches; 1.1 Pounds
 * Item model number :CH-1012
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :October 2, 2014
 * ASIN :B004TSM71Y

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #554,578 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #247323 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #1010 inWomen's Satchel Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.0 out of 5 stars189 ratings Fashion forward, practical, and compliant with many workplace clear bag policies, CHM’s line of designer-inspired briefcases, purses, and tote bags offer great value at an affordable price. These bags are easy to clean and sturdy enough to stand up to regular use as clear lunch bags, transparent purses, accessory bags, toiletry carriers, and more. Their extra-thick vinyl and reinforced seams keep them from collapsing in on themselves, and the heavyweight metal hardware on each bag far outperforms the silver-painted plastic found on similar models from other manufacturers.
feature_bullets: Trendy satchel and top-handle bag designs, both big and small. Our clear plastic purses offer an ideal blend of practicality and style. Ideally sized for carry on, travel (including the airport), events and public locations, and everyday use.

All the useful accoutrements. Featuring zipper closure, silver tone metallic hardware, and up to three separate pocket compartments for your phone, wallet, and water. The thick yet soft PVC is textured like vinyl, has waterproof qualities, and will help protect your belongings from splashes, rain, and more.

Available in tote bag and satchel bag styles with durable, thick handles ideal for carrying to work. Perfect as a cute accessory or as a highly practical bag for work in correctional settings, casinos, or anywhere else requiring a high degree of security.
Over your shoulder and out the door. Each designer inspired handbag features a long strap large enough to support under your arm - in the case of our satchel bag, it's removable.

100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE! At Clear Handbags & More we fully stand behind our products. Try our waist bags and see the difference for yourself. If you are not completely satisfied with our clear purses, we will gladly give you your money back, no questions asked!
